name: Center
description: The forward who plays in the middle of the ice, responsible for faceoffs and playmaking.

name: Left Wing
description: The forward who plays on the left side of the ice.

name: Right Wing
description: The forward who plays on the right side of the ice.

name: Defenseman
description: Players who primarily focus on preventing the opposing team from scoring.

name: Goaltender
description: The player responsible for directly preventing the opposing team from scoring.
